x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/relatedperson-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/RelatedPerson \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"RelatedPerson","id":"c4db09e2-f87b-427c-8599-ecee499b0573","identifier":[{"use":"usual","type":{"text":"INSEE"},"system":"urn:oid:1.2.250.1.61","value":"272117510400399"}],"active":true,"patient":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"relationship":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0131","code":"N"},{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode","code":"WIFE"}]}],"name":[{"family":"du Marché","given":["Bénédicte"]}],"telecom":[{"system":"phone","value":"+33 (237) 998327"}],"gender":"female","address":[{"line":["43, Place du Marché Sainte Catherine"],"city":"Paris","postalCode":"75004","country":"FRA"}],"photo":[{"contentType":"image/jpeg","url":"Binary/f016"}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.016+08:00"}}'

Name Bénédicte du Marché
Address 43, Place du Marché Sainte Catherine, 75004 Paris, France
Contacts Phone: +33 (237) 998327
"},"identifier":[{"use":"usual","type":{"text":"zz9SlXBqvMDqr"},"system":"urn:oid:1.2.250.1.61","value":"yewrhXFtRvmvN9"}],"active":true,"patient":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"relationship":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0131","code":"N"},{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode","code":"WIFE"}]}],"name":[{"family":"du Marché","_family":{"extension":[{"url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-prefix","valueString":"VV"}]},"given":["Bénédicte"]}],"telecom":[{"system":"phone","value":"d4h25kHEHXl7Ck"}],"gender":"female","address":[{"line":["43, Place du Marché Sainte Catherine"],"city":"Paris","postalCode":"75004","country":"FRA"}],"photo":[{"contentType":"image/jpeg","url":"Binary/f016"}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"taTklStRIeZZT"}]}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Indicates if the related person record is active

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description: A city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description: A country specified in an address

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postal code specified in an address

parameters.name: address-state
parameters.description: A state specified in an address

parameters.name: address-use
parameters.description: A use code specified in an address

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description: The Related Person's date of birth

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A value in an email contact

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender of the related person

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: An Identifier of the RelatedPerson

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient this related person is related to

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: A value in a phone contact

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description: A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

parameters.name: relationship
parameters.description: The relationship between the patient and the relatedperson

parameters.name: telecom
parameters.description: The value in any kind of contact
